docs.text: Login Page – OneHermes Login URL 🔗 Stage URL: https://stage3.onehermes.net/ Login Fields Field Name Description Username / Email Enter a valid username or email address Password Enter a valid password Forgot Password Option to reset the password Login Steps Open the OneHermes login URL. Enter Username or Email . Enter Password . Click Sign In . Validation Rules Username and Password are mandatory . Invalid credentials display an "Invalid username or password" error message. Language Selection Default language is English . Language can be changed using the language dropdown. Expected Result User is successfully redirected to the Dashboard . Invalid credentials display an appropriate error message.
docs.title: Login - Oneherms

docs.text: Login URL 🔗 Stage URL: https://stage3.onehermes.net/ Login Fields Field Name Description Username / Email Enter a valid username or email address Password Enter a valid password Forgot Password Option to reset the password Login Steps Open the OneHermes login URL. Enter Username or Email . Enter Password . Click Sign In . Validation Rules Username and Password are mandatory . Invalid credentials display an "Invalid username or password" error message. Language Selection Default language is English . Language can be changed using the language dropdown. Expected Result User is successfully redirected to the Dashboard . Invalid credentials display an appropriate error message.
docs.title: Login Page – OneHermes

docs.text: Maßnahme Approval Module Overview This page explains how to access the Maßnahmenzulassung screen in the OneHermes system after login. The Maßnahme Approval module is used to Create A Global Maßnahme and Location speacific Maßnahme Navigation Flow After successful login, follow the steps below to open the Maßnahme Approval page: Login → Certification → Maßnahme Approval → Global Maßnahme Screen Step-by-Step Process Step 1: Login to the System Open the OneHermes application. Enter valid username and password. Click Sign In . Dashboard page will be displayed. Step 2: Click Certification Tab On the left sidebar, locate Certification . Click on the Certification menu. Sub-menu options will be displayed. Available options: Carrier & Location Approval,Company, Maßnahmenzulassung Step 3: Click Maßnahmenzulassung From the Certification sub-menu, click Maßnahmenzulassung . System will load the Maßnahmenzulassung screen. Step 4: View Global Maßnahme List After clicking Maßnahmenzulassung, the Global Maßnahme screen will be displayed, showing both Global Maßnahme and location-specificMaßnahme. Search and Filter Search User can search Maßnahmes using the search box. Filters There are two filters available on the Summary screen. 1. Status Filter (Top Right Corner) Located at the top right corner of the screen. Used to filter Maßnahmes based on their status. ---->Example statuses: Approved Active Awaiting Approval Revision etc... 2. Maßnahme Type Filter (Maßnahme / location-specific Maßnahme) Available in the Maßnahme Creation filter section. Used to filter Maßnahmes based on Maßnahme type. ----> Users can filter Maßnahmes as: Global Maßnahmes Location-Specific Maßnahmes This helps users to easily view and manage Maßnahmes based on location and category. Expected Result Maßnahme Approval page is opened successfully. Global Maßnahme list is displayed. User can view and manage Maßnahmes.
docs.title: Massnahme approval

Used to filter Maßnahmes based on Maßnahme type. ----> Users can filter Maßnahmes as: Global Maßnahmes Location-Specific Maßnahmes This helps users to easily view and manage Maßnahmes based on location and category. docs.text: Apply for Approval Process After creating the Maßnahme, you must complete all the sub-modules and submit the Maßnahme for the approval process. Maßnahme Information Maßnahme Type Select the required Maßnahme type: Group One-on-One Coaching Internship Maßnahme Objective Select the appropriate Maßnahme objective from the available list. Other Fields Fill in all remaining mandatory fields in the form. Action Buttons After filling in the details, use the following buttons: Save Click Save to save the entered details. Save & Continue Click Save & Continue to save the details and go to the next section. Cancel Click Cancel to exit without saving. Skip Click Skip to move to the next section without filling the details. Session Information The selected Maßnahme Type values are reflected in the Session Information sub-tab. Coaching Units and Pricing Enter the respective coaching units. Price/Unit and Max. Revenue are auto-populated based on the entered units. The same pricing logic is applied for One-on-One Coaching and Internship. Internship Supervision Internship Supervision follows the same pricing process as Internship. Validation Rules Toggle ON: Value is calculated in UEs (45 minutes). Toggle OFF: Value is calculated in hours. Min and Max Constraints Enter the minimum and maximum values for: Group sessions One-on-One Coaching sessions These values define the allowed session limits. Company Plan Fill in the following details carefully: Number of UEs (Group Sessions) Enter how many UEs are contacted per day. Number of Group Sessions This field is auto-populated based on: Total Group UEs Number of UEs per Group Session **One-on-One Coaching and Internship The same calculation flow is applied for: One-on-One Coaching Internship Submission Before proceeding, make sure: All required fields are filled. Pricing is auto-populated correctly. Min and Max values are entered. Company Plan details are verified. Click Save & Continue to move to the next section. Curriculum Details Overview After completing the Session Information section, click Save & Continue . The system will navigate you to the Curriculum Details page. On This page, users can configure session details for: Group Sessions One-on-One Coaching Internship Sessions Users can enter session names, add descriptions, and review the auto-populated duration. Page Sections The Curriculum Details page consists of the following sections: Group Session This section is used to configure group-based training sessions. Fields: Session Name : Enter the name of the group session. Duration per Session : Auto-populated Session Information >Company Plan > Number of UEs Group sessions Description : Optional field to add session details. One-on-One Coaching This section is used for individual coaching sessions. Fields: Session Name : Enter the coaching session name. Duration per Session : Auto-populated Session Information >Company Plan >Number of UEs One-on-One sessions Description : Optional field for additional information. Internship Session This section is used for internship-related training sessions. Fields: Session Name : Enter the internship session name. Duration per Session : Auto-populated Session Information >Company Plan >Number of UEs Internship sessions Description : Optional field to describe the internship session. Duration per Session The Duration per Session field is automatically populated. The value is based on: - Session Information >Company Plan >Coaching type Configuraation Uploading Curriculum Documents If any supporting documents are required: Navigate to the Documents tab. Open Documents > Other Documents . Upload the relevant curriculum files. These documents will be linked to the Maßnahme. Saving Curriculum Details After entering all required information: Review the session names and descriptions. Verify the auto-populated duration values. Click the Save button. Result All entered values are saved successfully. The curriculum details are updated in the system. The Maßnahme configuration process continues. Validation Rules Duration per Session must be auto-generated. Uploaded documents must follow supported file formats. Apply for Approval – Document Submission Process Step 1: Save Curriculum Details Enter the required curriculum details. Click Save and Continue . The system will redirect you to the Documents tab. Step 2: Add Checklist and Upload Documents In the Documents tab, click on the required Checklist . Select the appropriate Checklist Title for the Maßnahme. Upload the required documents. The uploaded documents will be displayed in the Documents Table . Step 3: Apply for Approval Click on Apply for Approval Button in Documents Tab. An Email Popup will be displayed. Step 4: Email Details In the To field, enter the receiver’s email ID. The receiver’s email ID will be auto-populated based on the selected person in Fachkundige Stelle. The From field will display the logged-in user’s email ID. The uploaded documents will be automatically added to the Mail Description . Step 5: Send for Approval Review the email details. Click Send Message . The email will be sent to the receiver successfully. The Maßnahme status will be updated to Applied for Approval . Expected Result - Documents are uploaded successfully. - Approval email is sent to the receiver. - Maßnahme status changes to Applied for Approval .
docs.title: Apply for approval

docs.text: Maßnahme Creation – New Maahanme Overview The Maßnahme Creation page allows users to create and manage new Maßnahme in the OneHermes system. This screen is accessed by clicking the ( + ) icon from the Maßnahme Management module. Screen Name GlobalMaßnahme – Maßnahme Creation Field Description Field Name Mandatory Description Maßnahme Name Yes (*) Enter the name of the Maßnahme. Trager Certificate Yes (*) Dropdown values are reflected from the active company certifications. Maßnahme Status No Automatically displays Newmassnahme by default. Fachkundige Stelle Yes (*) Dropdown values are fetched from the Organization table where Organization Type = Fachkundige Stelle. Preferred organizations are listed first. E-mail Address Yes (*) Auto-populated based on the selected Fachkundige Stelle. Phone Number No Auto-populated based on the selected Fachkundige Stelle. Maßnahme Certificate Number Yes (*) The field becomes enabled only after the course is approved. Start Date No The field becomes enabled only after the course is approved. End Date No The field becomes enabled only after the course is approved. Recertification Trigger No The field becomes enabled only after the course is approved. Functional Behavior 1. Maßnahme Creation Access Click the + icon in the Maßnahme Management screen. The Maßnahme Creation page will be displayed. 2. Maßnahme Name User must enter a valid Maßnahme name. This field is mandatory. 3. Trager Certificate Dropdown values are loaded from: - Active Company Certifications. Only active certificates will be displayed. 4. Maßnahme Status Automatically set as Newmassnahme . This field is non-editable by default. 5. Fachkundige Stelle Dropdown values are fetched from the Organization Table . Only organizations with: will be displayed. Preferred organizations appear at the top. 6. Auto-Populated Fields When a Fachkundige Stelle is selected: E-mail Address → Auto-filled Phone Number → Auto-filled These values are fetched from the selected organization details. 7. Approval-Based Field Enablement Some fields remain disabled initially. After the Maßnahme is Approved , the remaining fields become enabled. Example: Certificate fields Validity fields Recertification fields Validation Rules Validation Type Rule Mandatory Check Maßnahme Name, Trager Certificate, Fachkundige Stelle, Email, Certificate Number must not be empty Dropdown Validation Only configured values can be selected Auto Population Email and Phone must load correctly after selecting Fachkundige Stelle Approval Validation Fields must enable only after approval Action Buttons Save Button Saves the Maßnahme details. Performs all validation checks before saving. Clear Button Clears all entered values. Resets the form. Sample Workflow Click + icon . Enter Maßnahme Name . Select Trager Certificate . Verify Maßnahme Status = Newmassnahme . Select Fachkundige Stelle . Check auto-filled Email & Phone . Enter Certificate Number. Select Dates. Click Save . Related Modules Maßnahme Management Organization Management Certification Management
docs.title: Course creation

End Date No The field becomes enabled only after the course is approved. Recertification Trigger No The field becomes enabled only after the course is approved.

docs.text: Final Approval Process After Revision Step 1: Open Course with Revision Status Navigate to the Course list. Select the course with status Revision . Click on the course to open it. Step 2: Open Session Information Navigate to the Session Information tab. Verify that the default status selection is set to Approved such as . Step 3: Approve the Course Click on the Approved button. Confirm the action if a confirmation popup is displayed. Once the Maßnahme is approved, the status is updated to Approved . The Approved button becomes disabled. The following fields are enabled: Maßnahme Certificate Number Start Date End Date Recertification Trigger Step 4: Auto Creation of Maßnahme After location selection,Clic### Step 2: Navigate to Target Location Open the approved Maßnahme. Go to Target Location section. Click on Select Location field. Expected Result: Select Location field should be enabled. Step 5: View Available Locations Click on the Select Location dropdown. System displays locations based on the company mapped with the certification. k Run Mßnahme system generates a location-specific Maßnahme. Expected Result: A New Location specific Mßnahme is created based on the selected location. Step 6: System Processing The system will validate the approval details. The approval will be saved successfully. Step 7: Status Update Verify that the course status is updated to Approved . The approved status will be reflected in the course list and course details screen. Expected Result Default status is set to Approved . Course is approved successfully. Course status changes to Approved . Approval details are saved in the system.
docs.title: Final approval

docs.text: Click on the Approved button. Confirm the action if a confirmation popup is displayed. Once the Maßnahme is approved, the status is updated to Approved . The Approved button becomes disabled. The following fields are enabled: Maßnahme Certificate Number Start Date End Date Recertification Trigger

docs.text: Click on the Select Location dropdown. System displays locations based on the company mapped with the certification. k Run Mßnahme system generates a location-specific Maßnahme. Expected Result: A New Location specific Mßnahme is created based on the selected location.
docs.title: Step 5: View Available Locations

docs.text: The system will validate the approval details. The approval will be saved successfully.
docs.title: Step 6: System Processing

docs.text: Verify that the course status is updated to Approved . The approved status will be reflected in the course list and course details screen.
docs.title: Step 7: Status Update

docs.text: Default status is set to Approved . Course is approved successfully. Course status changes to Approved . Approval details are saved in the system.
docs.title: Expected Result

docs.text: Revision Process – Resubmit for Approval Step 1: Open Maßnahme with Applied for Approval Status Navigate to the Maßnahme list. Select the Maßnahme with status Applied for Approval . Click on the Maßnahme to open it. Step 2: Revise Session Information Go to the Session Information tab. Click on Revise as Directed . Click Save and Continue . The system will navigate to the Curriculum Details screen. Step 3: Update Curriculum Details Review and update the required curriculum details. Click Save and Continue . The system will redirect you to the Documents tab. Step 4: Upload Revision Documents In the Documents tab, click on the required Checklist . Select the Revision Checklist . Upload all mandatory documents. Click Save . The uploaded documents will be displayed in the Documents Table . Step 5: Resubmit for Approval Click on Revision . The Email Popup will be displayed. Step 6: Email Details The uploaded documents will be automatically fetched in the email description. In the To field, the receiver’s email ID will be auto-populated. The From field will display the logged-in user’s email ID. Step 7: Send Revision for Approval Review the email content. Click Send Message . The email will be sent successfully to the receiver. The Maßnahme status will be updated to Revision . Expected Result - Revision documents are uploaded successfully. - Approval email is sent to the receiver. - Maßnahme status changes to Revision .

docs.text: Review and update the required curriculum details. Click Save and Continue . The system will redirect you to the Documents tab.

docs.text: In the Documents tab, click on the required Checklist . Select the Revision Checklist . Upload all mandatory documents. Click Save . The uploaded documents will be displayed in the Documents Table .
docs.title: Step 4: Upload Revision Documents

docs.text: Click on Revision . The Email Popup will be displayed.
docs.title: Step 5: Resubmit for Approval

docs.text: The uploaded documents will be automatically fetched in the email description. In the To field, the receiver’s email ID will be auto-populated. The From field will display the logged-in user’s email ID.
docs.title: Step 6: Email Details

docs.text: Review the email content. Click Send Message . The email will be sent successfully to the receiver. The Maßnahme status will be updated to Revision . Expected Result - Revision documents are uploaded successfully. - Approval email is sent to the receiver. - Maßnahme status changes to Revision .
docs.title: Step 7: Send Revision for Approval

docs.text: Apply for Measure – Document Submission Process Overview After completing the voucher and target location configuration, users can upload required documents and apply for a measure through the Documents module. Once the process is completed and the email is sent successfully, the Maßnahme status is updated automatically. Prerequisites Voucher and Target Location configuration must be completed. Location-specific Maßnahme must be active. User must have document upload permission. Required checklists must be configured. Step-by-Step Process Step 1: Open Documents Tab Navigate to the required Maßnahme. Open the Location-Specific Maßnahme . Click on the Documents tab. Expected Result: Documents module is displayed. Step 2: Select Required Checklists Select the default checklist. Select the Location-Specific Checklist . Expected Result: Selected checklists are highlighted and activated. Step 3: Upload Documents Click on Upload Document . Select the required files. Complete the upload process. Expected Result: Uploaded documents are listed successfully. Step 4: Save Document Details Click the Save button. Expected Result: Document details are saved without validation errors. Step 5: Apply for Measure Click on the Apply for Measure button. Expected Result: Email popup window is displayed. Step 6: Verify Email Popup Review the email popup. Verify that uploaded documents are displayed as attachments. Expected Result: All uploaded documents are visible in the popup. Step 7: Send Email Enter recipient email address (if required). Click Send Mail . Expected Result: - Email is sent successfully to the receiver. - Documents are attached correctly. Step 8: Verify Maßnahme Status Navigate back to the Maßnahme details page. Check the Maßnahme status. Expected Result: Maßnahme status is updated to Applied for Measure Number . Validation Points Both default and location-specific checklists are selectable. Documents upload without errors. Email popup shows correct attachments. Mail is delivered to the recipient. Status updates automatically after sending mail. Exception Scenarios If documents are missing, system displays validation message. If email fails, status is not updated. If mandatory checklist is not selected, apply action is blocked. Notes Ensure stable internet connection during document upload. Verify recipient email before sending. Contact system administrator if mail delivery fails.
docs.title: Apply for measure
Apply for Measure – Document Submission Process

docs.text: After completing the voucher and target location configuration, users can upload required documents and apply for a measure through the Documents module. Once the process is completed and the email is sent successfully, the Maßnahme status is updated automatically.
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: Voucher and Target Location configuration must be completed. Location-specific Maßnahme must be active. User must have document upload permission. Required checklists must be configured.
docs.title: Prerequisites

docs.text: Navigate to the required Maßnahme. Open the Location-Specific Maßnahme . Click on the Documents tab. Expected Result: Documents module is displayed.
docs.title: Step 1: Open Documents Tab

docs.text: Select the default checklist. Select the Location-Specific Checklist . Expected Result: Selected checklists are highlighted and activated.
docs.title: Step 2: Select Required Checklists

docs.text: Click on Upload Document . Select the required files. Complete the upload process. Expected Result: Uploaded documents are listed successfully.
docs.title: Step 3: Upload Documents

docs.text: Click the Save button. Expected Result: Document details are saved without validation errors.
docs.title: Step 4: Save Document Details

docs.text: Click on the Apply for Measure button. Expected Result: Email popup window is displayed.
docs.title: Step 5: Apply for Measure

docs.text: Review the email popup. Verify that uploaded documents are displayed as attachments. Expected Result: All uploaded documents are visible in the popup.
docs.title: Step 6: Verify Email Popup

docs.text: Enter recipient email address (if required). Click Send Mail . Expected Result: - Email is sent successfully to the receiver. - Documents are attached correctly.
docs.title: Step 7: Send Email

docs.text: Navigate back to the Maßnahme details page. Check the Maßnahme status. Expected Result: Maßnahme status is updated to Applied for Measure Number .
docs.title: Step 8: Verify Maßnahme Status

docs.text: Both default and location-specific checklists are selectable. Documents upload without errors. Email popup shows correct attachments. Mail is delivered to the recipient. Status updates automatically after sending mail.
docs.title: Validation Points

docs.text: If documents are missing, system displays validation message. If email fails, status is not updated. If mandatory checklist is not selected, apply action is blocked.
docs.title: Exception Scenarios

docs.text: Ensure stable internet connection during document upload. Verify recipient email before sending. Contact system administrator if mail delivery fails.
docs.title: Notes

docs.text: Maßnahme Activation After Measure Number Receipt Overview After the Maßnahme status is updated to Measure Number Received , users must configure the Room and Coach details in the Target Location module. Once these details are saved, the location-specific Maßnahme Maßnahme becomes active in the system. Prerequisites Maßnahme status must be Measure Number Received . Location-specific Maßnahme must be created. User must have edit permission. Available Rooms and Coaches must be configured. Step-by-Step Process Step 1: Open Maßnahme with Measure Number Received Status Login to the application. Navigate to Maßnahme Management . Filter Maßnahmes by status Measure Number Received . Select the required Maßnahme. Expected Result: Maßnahme details page is displayed. Step 2: Navigate to Target Location Module Click on the Target Location tab. Open the configuration section. Expected Result: Target Location settings are accessible. Step 3: Select Room and Coach Select the appropriate Room from the dropdown. Select the assigned Coach . Expected Result: Selected Room and Coach are displayed correctly. Step 4: Save Configuration Click the Save button. Expected Result: - Maßnahme details are saved successfully. - Location-specific Maßnahme Maßnahme status is updated to Active . Validation Points Only active Rooms and Coaches are selectable. Fields are mandatory before saving. Data is stored without errors. Maßnahme appears in active Maßnahme listings. Exception Scenarios If Room or Coach is not selected, system displays validation message. If save fails, Maßnahme remains inactive. If user does not have permission, fields are disabled. Notes Ensure Room and Coach availability before assignment. Reassignment requires admin approval. Contact support for configuration issues.
docs.title: Course active

docs.text: Location SpecificMaßnahme Overview After the Maßnahme is approved, the system allows users to select a target location. The available locations are displayed based on the company linked to the selected certification. Once a location is selected, a location-specific Maßnahme is automatically created for the Maßnahme. Prerequisites Maßnahme must be in Approved status. Certification must be assigned to the Maßnahme. Company should be mapped with locations. Step-by-Step Process Step 1: Verify Maßnahme Approval Login to the application. Navigate to Maßnahme Management . Open the required Maßnahme. Confirm that the status is Approved . Expected Result: Maßnahme status should be Approved . Expected Result: Only relevant company locations should be displayed. Step 4: Select Location Choose the required location from the list. Save the selection. Expected Result: Selected location should be saved successfully. Step 5: Auto Creation of Maßnahme After location selection,Clic### Step 2: Navigate to Target Location Open the approved Maßnahme. Go to Target Location section. Click on Select Location field. Expected Result: Select Location field should be enabled. Step 3: View Available Locations Click on the Select Location dropdown. System displays locations based on the company mapped with the certification. k Run Mßnahme system generates a location-specific Maßnahme. Expected Result: A New Location specific Mßnahme is created based on the selected location. Notes If locations are not displayed, verify certification-company mapping. Contact system administrator for missing configurations.

docs.text: Measure Number Receipt and Status Update Process Overview After applying for a measure, the government authority responds with a Measure Number via email. Once the response is received, the user must manually update the Maßnahme status and enter the received measure number in the system. After saving, the system updates the Maßnahme status automatically. Prerequisites Maßnahme must be in Applied for Measure Number status. Measure number response must be received via email. User must have edit permission for Maßnahme details. Step-by-Step Process Step 1: Receive Measure Number Email Monitor the registered email inbox. Receive the response from the government authority. Note the received Measure Number. Expected Result: Measure Number is received through official communication. Step 2: Open Maßnahme Details Login to the application. Navigate to Maßnahme Management . Open the relevant Maßnahme. Expected Result: Maßnahme details page is displayed. Step 3: Update Maßnahme Status Manually Click on Edit or Update Status . Change the Maßnahme status to Measure Number Received . Expected Result: Status field becomes editable. Step 4: Enter Measure Number Locate the Measure Number field. Enter the received Measure Number correctly. Expected Result: Entered value is accepted without validation errors. Step 5: Save Changes Click the Save button. Expected Result: - Measure Number is stored successfully. - Maßnahme status is updated to Measure Number Received . Validation Points Measure Number format is validated. Status cannot be updated without entering a valid Measure Number. Changes are saved correctly. Updated status is reflected in Maßnahme list view. Exception Scenarios If Measure Number is invalid, system displays error message. If Save fails, status remains unchanged. If user does not have permission, edit option is disabled. Notes Always verify the Measure Number before saving. Keep email confirmation for audit reference. Contact administrator for access-related issues.
docs.title: Measure number receipt

docs.text: Voucher Mapping in Location-Specific Maßnahme Overview After creating a location-specific Maßnahme, users can configure voucher details through the Target Location sub-module. When the Voucher Received toggle is enabled, the system automatically populates relevant fields based on participant and Maßnahme data. Prerequisites Location-specific Maßnahme must be created. At least one participant should be mapped to the Maßnahme. Maßnahme objective must be configured. User should have edit access. Step-by-Step Process Step 1: Open Location-Specific Maßnahme Navigate to Maßnahme Management . Open the required Maßnahme. Click on the created Location-Specific Maßnahme . Expected Result: Location-specific Maßnahme details page is displayed. Step 2: Navigate to Target Location Module Open the Target Location sub-module. Locate the Voucher Received toggle. Expected Result: Target Location module is accessible. Step 3: Enable Voucher Received Toggle Turn ON the Voucher Received toggle. Expected Result: - Voucher Number field becomes enabled. - Voucher Number is auto-populated from the first mapped participant (if available). Step 4: Verify Voucher Number Auto-Population Check the Voucher Number field. Expected Result: - If any participant has a voucher for This Maßnahme, the first participant’s voucher number is automatically populated. - If no voucher exists, the field remains editable. Step 5: Validate Operative Service and Jobcenter Fields Verify that Operative Service and Jobcenter fields are displayed. Expected Result: Field behavior depends on the Maßnahme objective: Maßnahme Objective Operative Service Jobcenter Section 16 Disabled Enabled Section 45 Enabled Disabled Step 6: Configure Operative Service / Jobcenter Details Select the enabled field (Operative Service or Jobcenter). Verify populated details. Expected Result: - Operative Service is auto-populated based on location. - Jobcenter requires manual entry (if enabled). - Email and Phone Number are auto-populated for selected values. Step 7: Save Voucher Configuration Review all entered and auto-populated values. Click Save . Expected Result: Voucher configuration is saved successfully without errors. Validation Points Voucher Number is auto-populated when available. Only one of Operative Service or Jobcenter is enabled at a time. Disabled fields are not editable. Contact details are populated automatically. Data is saved correctly. Exception Scenarios If no participant voucher exists, Voucher Number remains empty. If Maßnahme objective is not configured, both fields remain disabled. System displays validation message for missing mandatory fields. Notes Ensure participant vouchers are properly mapped before enabling the toggle. Contact administrator for configuration-related issues.
docs.title: Voucher mapping
